title: The Techniques of tempera and oil painting
creator_credit: Peter Coltman and University of Glasgow Television Service
brief_description: Using a fifteenth century document as a source the film describes the preparation and techniques of tempera and oil painting, including gilding. Narrated by Mac Ritchie. Written and demonstrated by James Hickey.
